name: SnakEscape: Classic
detailed_description:
SnakEscape Classic is an original version of 2016 game that will turn time back and allow you to play it like it was in past. We've updated every pice of game detail & polished original low-poly character & environment models. It's a good choice to back to the game as it was originally designed.

Key features:

  • Original single-player levels that will test your brains.
  • Thematic seasons: spring, summer, autumn and winter. Each season has it's unique visual and gameplay features!
  • Original soundtrack from early stage of development that we planned to release but decided to change.
  • Simple controls and cozy low-poly visual style.
  • Now with full controller support!
  • Includes fixes & most basic improvements from latest SnakEscape update.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 128 MB or more and with support for Pixel Shader 5.0
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard & Mouse

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 1.66GHz+
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 128 MB or more and with support for Pixel Shader 5.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard / Mouse / Controller
